```{r setup-libraries}
library(papaja)
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(rmarkdown)
library(knitr)
library(emmeans)
library(afex)
library(flextable)

r_refs("./markdown/r-references.bib")

r_citations <- cite_r(
  file = "./markdown/r-references.bib",
  pkgs = c("papaja", "tidyverse", "knitr", "rmarkdown", "emmeans", "flextable", "afex"),
  omit = FALSE,
  footnote = TRUE
  )

FitFlextableToPage <- function(ft, pgwidth = 6){

  ft_out <- ft %>% autofit()

  ft_out <- width(ft_out, width = dim(ft_out)$widths*pgwidth /(flextable_dim(ft_out)$widths))
  return(ft_out)
}
```

```{r setup-print-percent}
print_percent <- function(freq){
  percent = freq*100
  apa_msg = papaja::apa_num(percent)
  final = paste(apa_msg, "%")
  return(final)
}
```

```{r}
apa_footer <- function(data, note){
  flextable::add_footer_lines(
    x = data,
    " "
    ) %>%
    flextable::compose(
      # x = data,
      i = 1,
      j = 1,
      part = "footer",
      value = as_paragraph(
        as_i("Note. "), note
      )
    )
}
```
